analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' don zab dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa la dri ba dris pa /

analyzed: chos thams cad ni gang /

analyzed: ji ltar na gnyis su med pa yin /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

translated: all phenomena, all phenomena, are as numerous as the two,

analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin no //
translated: nor unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas ni 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas ni 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin /
translated: The unconditioned is neither unconditioned

original: 'dus byas kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyang ma yin no //
translated: nor conditioned.🔽”

analyzed: smras pa / kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors,

original: @5a *// rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyi 'phags pa'i shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the inexpressible perfect enlightenment of the noble ones through their noble wisdom and noble seeing.

original: brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas zhes ming du btags so //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas zhes ming du btags so //
translated: The name “conditioned” is given in order to realize that very inexpressible reality.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba de'ang ston pas btags pa'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba de'ang ston pas btags pa'i tshig yin te /
translated: “unconditioned” is also a term designated by the Teacher.

original: ston pas btags pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni kun tu rtog pa las byung ba tha snyad du brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: ston pas btags pa'i tshig gang yin pa de ni kun tu rtog pa las byung ba tha snyad du brjod pa yin la /
translated: Any term designated by the Teacher arises from conceptualization and is expressed conventionally.

original: kun tu rtog pa las byung ba tha snyad du brjod pa gang yin pa de ni kun tu rtog @5b pa sna tshogs kyi tha snyad du brjod pa gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma yin no //
analyzed: kun tu rtog pa las byung ba tha snyad du brjod pa gang yin pa de ni kun tu rtog @5b pa sna tshogs kyi tha snyad du brjod pa gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma yin no //
translated: The conventional expressions that arise from conceptualization are not unconditioned because the conventional expressions of various conceptualizations are not at all established.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: 'dus byas zhes bya ba de'ang tha snyad kyi khongs su gtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dus byas zhes bya ba de'ang tha snyad kyi khongs su gtogs pa yin la /
translated: the so-called conditioned is also included within the conventional,

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas su ma gtogs pa gang ci brjod kyang de'ang de dang 'dra ba nyid du gyur /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas su ma gtogs pa gang ci brjod kyang de'ang de dang 'dra ba nyid du gyur /
translated: and whatever is expressed as not included within the conditioned or unconditioned is also just like that.

original: de'ang de dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'ang de dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: It is also just like that.

original: brjod pa ni dngos po med pa can yang ma yin te; dngos po de'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: brjod pa ni dngos po med pa can yang ma yin te; dngos po de'ang gang zhe na /
translated: Expressions are not non-existent things, and what is that thing?

original: 'phags pa rnams kyis 'phags pa'i shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa ste; brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags so //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyis 'phags pa'i shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa ste; brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags so //
translated: It is that which is fully and perfectly awakened to by the noble ones through their noble knowledge and noble seeing as inexpressible, and it is given the name unconditioned in order to fully and perfectly realize that very inexpressible reality.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /🔽ji ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyis dngos po de 'phags pa'i shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas dang /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / ji ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyis dngos po de 'phags pa'i shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas dang /
translated: O son of the victors!

original: 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags pa yin no //
translated: How is it that the noble ones fully and perfectly awaken to that thing through their noble knowledge and noble seeing as inexpressible, and give it the names conditioned and unconditioned in order to fully and perfectly realize that very inexpressible reality?

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste /🔽rtsva dag gam /🔽lo ma dag gam /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste / rtsva dag gam / lo ma dag gam /
translated: For example, a magician or a magician’s skilled apprentice, standing in the middle of a crossroads in a town,🔽might gather together grass,🔽leaves,

original: shing dag gam /
analyzed: shing dag gam /
translated: wood,

original: gseg ma dag gam /🔽gyo du ma dag gcig tu bsdus nas sgyu ma'i @6a *//
analyzed: gseg ma dag gam / gyo du ma dag gcig tu bsdus nas sgyu ma'i @6a *//
translated: pebbles,🔽and potsherds, and then

original: las sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
analyzed: las sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
translated: display various magical creations, such as

original: glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang; bee d'urya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru'i tshogs dang / nor dang /🔽'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs rnam par bstan na /
analyzed: glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang; bee d'urya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru'i tshogs dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs rnam par bstan na /
translated: an army of elephants, an army of horses, an army of chariots, an army of infantry, collections of jewels, pearls, lapis lazuli, conch shells, crystals, and coral, and collections of wealth,🔽grains, treasuries, and storehouses.

original: de la sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can /🔽rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can /
analyzed: de la sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can / rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can /
translated: If he were to display these to beings who are foolish by nature,🔽who are deluded by nature,

original: shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can /
translated: and who are of a foolish and deluded nature,

original: rtsva dang / lo ma dang / shing dang / gseg ma dang / gyo dum de dag mi shes pa de dag ni de mthong ngam thos na 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: rtsva dang / lo ma dang / shing dang / gseg ma dang / gyo dum de dag mi shes pa de dag ni de mthong ngam thos na 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Those who do not know that the grass, leaves, wood, pebbles, and gravel are not an army, when they see or hear it, think:

original: glang po che'i tshogs snang ba gang yin pa de ni yod do //
analyzed: glang po che'i tshogs snang ba gang yin pa de ni yod do //
translated: ‘The appearance of an army of elephants exists.

original: rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru'i tshogs dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang /
analyzed: rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru'i tshogs dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang /
translated: The appearance of an army of horses, chariots, and foot soldiers exists. The appearance of an army of jewels, pearls, lapis lazuli, conch shells, crystals, and coral exists. The appearance of an army of wealth, grain, treasuries, and storehouses exists.’

original: bang ba'i tshogs snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing /
analyzed: bang ba'i tshogs snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing /
translated: They think, ‘The appearance of an army of elephants exists.🔽The appearance of an army of horses, chariots, and foot soldiers exists. The appearance of an army of jewels, pearls, lapis lazuli, conch shells, crystals, and coral exists. The appearance of an army of wealth, grain, treasuries, and storehouses exists.’

original: de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du de la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas /
analyzed: de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du de la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas /
translated: They insistently hold and cling to it just as they have seen it and just as they have heard it.

original: 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rdzun pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rdzun pa'o //
translated: They say, ‘This is true. The rest is false.’

original: zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par yang byed de /
analyzed: zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par yang byed de /
translated: They make conventional designations in this way.

original: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya dgos pa yin no //
translated: They will have to investigate this matter further.

original: de la sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa /
analyzed: de la sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa /
translated: “Among them, those sentient beings who are not foolish by nature,

original: @6b rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa /
analyzed: @6b rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa /
translated: who are not confused by nature,

original: shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can rtsva dang / lo ma dang / shing dang / gseg ma dang / gyo dum de dag shes pa de dag ni de mthong ngam thos na 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can rtsva dang / lo ma dang / shing dang / gseg ma dang / gyo dum de dag shes pa de dag ni de mthong ngam thos na 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: who are by nature endowed with wisdom, and who understand that the grass, leaves, wood, pebbles, and gravel are not real, when they see or hear this, will think as follows:

original: glang po che'i tshogs snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni med do //🔽rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru'i tshogs dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang /
analyzed: glang po che'i tshogs snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni med do // rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru'i tshogs dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang /
translated: ‘The appearance of an elephant troop that is seen here does not exist.

original: bang ba'i tshogs snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni med kyi /
analyzed: bang ba'i tshogs snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni med kyi /
translated: The appearance of a horse troop, a chariot troop, an infantry troop, and the appearance of a troop of jewels, pearls, lapis lazuli, conch shells, crystals, and coral, as well as the appearance of wealth, grain, treasuries, and storehouses that is seen here does not exist.

original: gang la glang po che'i tshogs kyi 'du shes dang / glang po che'i tshogs kyi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung ba dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs kyi bar gyi 'du shes dang / de dag gi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung ba sgyu ma byas pa 'di ni yod /
analyzed: gang la glang po che'i tshogs kyi 'du shes dang / glang po che'i tshogs kyi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung ba dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs kyi bar gyi 'du shes dang / de dag gi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung ba sgyu ma byas pa 'di ni yod /
translated: “The perception of an assembly of elephants, the perception of the enumeration of an assembly of elephants, up to the perception of an assembly of wealth, grain, treasuries, and storehouses, and the perception of the enumeration of those exists.

original: mig slu bar byed pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing /
analyzed: mig slu bar byed pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing /
translated: This conjured illusion exists. This deception of the eye exists.’

original: de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du de la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad mi 'dogs kyi /
analyzed: de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du de la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad mi 'dogs kyi /
translated: “They do not make the conventional designation, ‘This is true, the other is false,’ while insisting on the view they have seen and heard, holding it to be supreme and truly existent.

original: 'di ltar don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed de /
translated: They make the conventional designation in order to make known the meaning.

original: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya mi dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya mi dgos pa yin no //
translated: Later, they do not need to investigate it.”

original: de bzhin du sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can so so'i skye @7a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can so so'i skye @7a *//
translated: In the same way, there are sentient beings who are of childish nature, ordinary beings.🔽

original: bor gyur pa /
analyzed: bor gyur pa /
translated: In the same way, there are sentient beings who are of childish nature, who are ordinary beings,

original: shes rab 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ma thob pa /
analyzed: shes rab 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ma thob pa /
translated: who have not attained the noble, supramundane wisdom,

original: chos thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i chos nyid mngon par mi shes pa de dag ni 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas te mthong ngam thos na /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i chos nyid mngon par mi shes pa de dag ni 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas te mthong ngam thos na /
translated: and who do not understand the inexpressible reality of all phenomena. When they see or hear about the conditioned and the unconditioned,

original: 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: they think,🔽‘This appearance of the conditioned and the unconditioned exists.’

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing; de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du de la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par yang byed de /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing; de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du de la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par yang byed de /
translated: They insistently grasp and cling to it as they have seen it and heard it, and they also make the conventional designation, ‘This is true, the others are false.’

original: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya dgos pa yin no //
translated: This is something that they will have to investigate further.

original: de la sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa bden pa mthong ba /
analyzed: de la sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa bden pa mthong ba /
translated: Those sentient beings who are not of childish nature, who have seen the truth,

original: shes rab 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa thob pa /
analyzed: shes rab 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa thob pa /
translated: who have attained the noble supramundane wisdom,

original: chos thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i chos nyid mngon par shes pa de dag ni 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas de mthong ngam thos na 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i chos nyid mngon par shes pa de dag ni 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas de mthong ngam thos na 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: who have realized the inexpressible reality of all phenomena, when they see or hear about conditioned and unconditioned phenomena, they think as follows:

original: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni med kyi /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni med kyi /
translated: “That which appears as conditioned and unconditioned does not exist.

original: gang la 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung ba /
analyzed: gang la 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung ba /
translated: However, that which gives rise to the notion of conditioned and unconditioned, the notion of the categories of conditioned and unconditioned,

original: rnam par rtog pa las byung ba /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa las byung ba /
translated: arises from conceptualization.

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma sgyu ma lta bu 'di ni yod /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma sgyu ma lta bu 'di ni yod /
translated: This illusory sign of conditioned phenomena exists.”

original: blo rnam par rmongs @7b par byed pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du de la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di ni bden gyi gzhan na rdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad mi 'dogs kyi /
analyzed: blo rnam par rmongs @7b par byed pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du de la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di ni bden gyi gzhan na rdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad mi 'dogs kyi /
translated: They think, ‘This confusion of the mind exists,’ and they insistently cling to it as supreme, just as they have seen it and just as they have heard it. They do not say, ‘This is true, the rest is false.’

original: 'di ltar don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed de /
translated: They say, ‘In order to understand the meaning, we should use conventional expressions.’

original: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya mi dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya mi dgos pa yin no //
translated: They do not need to investigate further.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyis dngos po de 'phags pa'i shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par sangs rgyas shing /
analyzed: de ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyis dngos po de 'phags pa'i shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par sangs rgyas shing /
translated: in this way, the noble ones have realized that this thing is inexpressible through noble wisdom and noble vision.

original: brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas zhes med du btags pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas zhes med du btags pa yin no //
translated: In order to realize that very inexpressible reality, they use the conventional expressions ‘conditioned’ and ‘unconditioned.’

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' don zab dgongs pa nges par 'grel gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' don zab dgongs pa nges par 'grel gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Gambhīrārthasamdhinirmocana spoke these verses:

original: zab mo byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa //
analyzed: zab mo byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa //
translated: The profound is not the domain of fools.

original: brjod med gnyis min rgyal bas bstan mdzad kyang //
analyzed: brjod med gnyis min rgyal bas bstan mdzad kyang //
translated: The Victor taught it to be inexpressible, nondual,

original: byis pa gti mug rmongs pa 'di dag ni //
analyzed: byis pa gti mug rmongs pa 'di dag ni //
translated: But these fools, obscured by delusion,

original: smra ba'i spros la dga' zhing gnyis la gnas //
analyzed: smra ba'i spros la dga' zhing gnyis la gnas //
translated: Delight in the proliferation of speech and abide in duality.

original: ma rtogs pa'am log par rtog pa dag /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa'am log par rtog pa dag /
translated: Those who do not understand or misunderstand

original: lug dang ba lang dag tu yang skye zhing //
analyzed: lug dang ba lang dag tu yang skye zhing //
translated: Are born even as sheep and cattle.

original: de dag shes pa'i smra ba de bor nas //
analyzed: de dag shes pa'i smra ba de bor nas //
translated: Having abandoned that speech of understanding,

original: shin tu yun ring 'khor ba 'dir 'khor 'gyur //
analyzed: shin tu yun ring 'khor ba 'dir 'khor 'gyur //
translated: They will wander in this cyclic existence for a very long time.

original: don zab dgongs pa nges par 'grel gyi le'u ste dang po'o ////🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das la byad @8a *//
analyzed: don zab dgongs pa nges par 'grel gyi le'u ste dang po'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byad @8a *//
translated: This concludes the first chapter on the explanation of the profound intention in the Bodhisattva Collection.

original: chub sems dpa' chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: chub sems dpa' chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Dharmodgata said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: sngon gyi dus rnams kyi shin tu snga ma zhig na /
analyzed: sngon gyi dus rnams kyi shin tu snga ma zhig na /
translated: in the very distant past,

original: 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na /
analyzed: 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na /
translated: Beyond this world system, past as many world systems as there are grains of sand in seventy-seven Ganges Rivers,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya chen gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams grags pa can zhes bgyi ba der bdag mchis pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya chen gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams grags pa can zhes bgyi ba der bdag mchis pa'i tshe /
translated: there is a world system called Renowned, the buddha realm of the thus-gone Vast Renown.

original: de na bdag gis mu stegs can rang rang gi ston pa la sogs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun 'di lta ste /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam bgyid do //

analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

analyzed: chos 'phags de de bzhin no //

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /

analyzed: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi phan tshun rig par bya ba ni /

original: chos 'phags / gzhan @9a *//
analyzed: chos 'phags / gzhan @9a *//

analyzed: yang don dam pa ni brjod du med pa yin par ngas bshad la /

analyzed: don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //

original: chos 'phags / de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'phags / de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //

analyzed: chos 'phags / gzhan yang don dam pa ni rtsod pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin par ngas bshad la /

original: chos 'phags / de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'phags / de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Dharmodgata, therefore, by this method you should know that the ultimate is that which has the characteristic that completely transcends all thought.

original: mos par mi nus so //
analyzed: mos par mi nus so //

analyzed: yun ring po nas @9b 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la mos pa / 'dod pa'i yongs su gdung ba dag gis yongs su gdungs pa ni nang gi rab tu dben pa'i bde ba gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg /
translated: Those who have long been devoted to the desire for desire,

analyzed: bya'i mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba la brtag pa'am /

analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'am / mos par mi nus so // yun ring po nas kun tu smra ba la mos pa /

analyzed: 'jig tshogs 'gog pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la brtag pa'am / rjes su dpag pa'am /

translated: It is impossible to conceive, infer, or even imagine the cessation of the perishing aggregates, which is nirvana.

original: mos par mi nus so //🔽chos 'phags / de bzhin du rtog ge pa thams cad kyis kyang don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid brtag pa'am /🔽rjes su dpag pa'am /
analyzed: mos par mi nus so // chos 'phags / de bzhin du rtog ge pa thams cad kyis kyang don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid brtag pa'am / rjes su dpag pa'am /

analyzed: mos @10a *// par mi nus so //

original: de ni rtog ge kun las 'das mtshan nyid //

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros shin tu rnam dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi slad du 'di skad ces don dam pa ni phra ba /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavat,

analyzed: 'di la bdag gis sa phyogs shig na /
translated: in this regard, I have seen in a certain place

original: mi gsal ba /

analyzed: de de bzhin te /

analyzed: byis pa rmongs pa /

original: mi gsal ba /
analyzed: mi gsal ba /

analyzed: mi mkhas pa /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: dper na / 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa nyid dang / zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / chos thams cad la gang bdag med pa nyid kyang de dag dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: dper na / 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa nyid dang / zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / chos thams cad la gang bdag med pa nyid kyang de dag dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
translated: For example, impermanence in all compounded phenomena, suffering in all contaminated phenomena, and selflessness in all phenomena are not different characteristics from them.

original: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no //🔽blo gros shin tu rnam dag 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / 'dod chags kyi ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang 'dod chags dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no // blo gros shin tu rnam dag 'di lta ste / dper na / 'dod chags kyi ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang 'dod chags dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
translated: For example, impermanence in all conditioned things, suffering in all contaminated things, and the selflessness of all things are not easily characterized as having a different characteristic than those things, nor are they easily characterized as not having a different characteristic than those things.🔽Suviśuddhamati, for example, the characteristic of non-peace of desire and the characteristic of defilement are not easily characterized as having a different characteristic than desire, nor are they easily characterized as not having a different characteristic than desire.

original: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi ji lta ba bzhin du zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi ji lta ba bzhin du zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: And just as with desire, so it is with hatred and ignorance.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag de bzhin du 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag de bzhin du 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
translated: “Sumati, in the same way, the characteristics of conditioned phenomena and the characteristics of the ultimate cannot be said to be different characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par mi bzod do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par mi bzod do //
translated: They cannot be said to be the same characteristics.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag ngas ni de ltar don dam pa phra ba /
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag ngas ni de ltar don dam pa phra ba /
translated: “Sumati, in this way, I have fully awakened to the characteristics of the ultimate, which are subtle,

original: mchog tu phra ba /
analyzed: mchog tu phra ba /
translated: supremely subtle,

original: mchog tu zab pa /
analyzed: mchog tu zab pa /
translated: supremely profound,

original: rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: difficult to realize,

original: mchog tu dka' ba /
analyzed: mchog tu dka' ba /
translated: supremely difficult,

original: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: and beyond being the same or different.

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs @14b rgyas nas kyang bsnyad cing gsal bar byas /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs @14b rgyas nas kyang bsnyad cing gsal bar byas /
translated: Having fully awakened, I have explained it, made it clear,

original: rnam par phye /🔽gdags pa byas /
analyzed: rnam par phye / gdags pa byas /
translated: revealed it,🔽designated it,

original: rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: rab tu bstan to //
translated: and taught it.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
translated: ” Then the Blessed One spoke these verses:

original: 'du byed khams dang don dam mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: 'du byed khams dang don dam mtshan nyid ni //
translated: “The characteristics of the conditioned realm and the ultimate

original: gcig dang tha dad bral ba'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: gcig dang tha dad bral ba'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: The characteristic of being free from being the same or different🔽Is the characteristic of the ultimate.

original: gcig dang tha dad du yang gang rtog pa //
analyzed: gcig dang tha dad du yang gang rtog pa //
translated: Those who conceive of it as the same or different

original: de dag tshul bzhin ma yin zhugs pa yin //
analyzed: de dag tshul bzhin ma yin zhugs pa yin //
translated: Are not properly engaged.🔽The insight and serenity🔽Of the one who is born

original: skye ba po yi lhag mthong dang // zhi gnas goms par byas nas ni //
analyzed: skye ba po yi lhag mthong dang // zhi gnas goms par byas nas ni //
translated: Are cultivated,🔽And one is liberated from the bonds of negative propensities

original: gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba dang // mtshan ma'i 'ching las rnam grol 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba dang // mtshan ma'i 'ching las rnam grol 'gyur //
translated: And the bonds of signs.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gi le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gi le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
translated: This is the third chapter, called “Pure Wisdom.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the venerable Subhūti:

original: rab 'byor khyod kyis sems can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems can ni ji tsam zhig yod par shes /
analyzed: rab 'byor khyod kyis sems can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems can ni ji tsam zhig yod par shes /
translated: “Subhūti, how many beings do you know in the realm of beings who, having become conceited, proclaim their knowledge?”

original: khyod kyis sems can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems can ni ji tsam zhig yod par shes /
analyzed: khyod kyis sems can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems can ni ji tsam zhig yod par shes /
translated: How many beings do you know in the realm of beings who are not conceited and who teach knowledge?

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bdag ni sems can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis par shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa'i sems can ni nyung shas shig mchis par 'tshal lags kyis bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bdag ni sems can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis par shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa'i sems can ni nyung shas shig mchis par 'tshal lags kyis bcom ldan 'das /
translated: I know that there are very few beings in the realm of beings who are not conceited and who teach knowledge.🔽Blessed One,

original: bdag gis sems @15a *//🔽can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa'i sems can ni tshad ma mchis /
analyzed: bdag gis sems @15a *// can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa'i sems can ni tshad ma mchis /
translated: I know that there are countless,

original: grangs ma mchis /🔽brjod du ma mchis par 'tshal lags te /
analyzed: grangs ma mchis / brjod du ma mchis par 'tshal lags te /
translated: innumerable,🔽inexpressible beings in the realm of beings who are conceited and who teach knowledge.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag dus gcig cig na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag dus gcig cig na /
translated: Blessed One,🔽at one time

original: dgon pa nags khrod chen po zhig na mchis pa'i tshe /
analyzed: dgon pa nags khrod chen po zhig na mchis pa'i tshe /
translated: I was in a great forest wilderness.

original: de na bdag gi nye 'khor na dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig kyang dgon pa nags khrod chen po na rten cing gnas lags te /
analyzed: de na bdag gi nye 'khor na dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig kyang dgon pa nags khrod chen po na rten cing gnas lags te /
translated: There, in the great wilderness forest, many monks live in my vicinity.

original: bdag gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe dge slong phan tshun nas mchis shing mjal nas /
analyzed: bdag gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe dge slong phan tshun nas mchis shing mjal nas /
translated: In the morning, the monks gather and meet each other.

original: chos rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ston pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de /
analyzed: chos rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ston pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de /
translated: They teach the realization of various kinds of phenomena and thereby communicate knowledge.

original: de na kha cig ni phung po dmigs pa dang / phung po'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / phung po'i skye ba dmigs pa dang / phung po'i 'jig pa dmigs pa dang / phung po 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / phung po 'gog pa mngon du bgyid pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
analyzed: de na kha cig ni phung po dmigs pa dang / phung po'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / phung po'i skye ba dmigs pa dang / phung po'i 'jig pa dmigs pa dang / phung po 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / phung po 'gog pa mngon du bgyid pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
translated: Some communicate knowledge by observing the aggregates, observing the characteristics of the aggregates, observing the arising of the aggregates, observing the destruction of the aggregates, observing the cessation of the aggregates, and observing the realization of the cessation of the aggregates.

original: kha cig phung po dmigs pas ji lta ba de bzhin du kha cig ni skye mched dmigs pas /
analyzed: kha cig phung po dmigs pas ji lta ba de bzhin du kha cig ni skye mched dmigs pas /
translated: Just as some communicate knowledge by observing the aggregates, some communicate knowledge by observing the sense sources.

original: kha cig rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /🔽kha cig ni zas dmigs pa dang / zas kyi mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / zas kyi skye ba dmigs pa dang / zas kyi 'jig pa dmigs pa dang / @15b zas 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / zas 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
analyzed: kha cig rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid / kha cig ni zas dmigs pa dang / zas kyi mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / zas kyi skye ba dmigs pa dang / zas kyi 'jig pa dmigs pa dang / @15b zas 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / zas 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
translated: Some teach cognition by observing dependent origination.🔽Some teach cognition by observing food, the characteristics of food, the arising of food, the cessation of food, the realization of the cessation of food, and the practice leading to the cessation of food.

original: kha cig ni bden pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs pa dang / bden pa yongs su shes pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa spangs pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa mngon du bgyi ba dmigs pa dang / bden pa sgom pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
analyzed: kha cig ni bden pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs pa dang / bden pa yongs su shes pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa spangs pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa mngon du bgyi ba dmigs pa dang / bden pa sgom pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
translated: Some teach cognition by observing the truths, the characteristics of the truths, the understanding of the truths, the abandonment of the truths, the realization of the truths, and the cultivation of the truths.

original: kha cig ni khams kyi dmigs pa dang / khams kyi mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / khams sna tshogs pa nyid dmigs pa dang / khams du ma dmigs pa dang / khams 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / khams 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba dmigs pas shes pas brda sprod par bgyid /🔽kha cig ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: kha cig ni khams kyi dmigs pa dang / khams kyi mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / khams sna tshogs pa nyid dmigs pa dang / khams du ma dmigs pa dang / khams 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / khams 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba dmigs pas shes pas brda sprod par bgyid / kha cig ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa dmigs pa dang /
translated: Some teach knowledge by means of the observation of the elements, the observation of the signs of the elements, the observation of the diversity of the elements, the observation of the multiplicity of the elements, the observation of the cessation of the elements, and the observation of the actualization of the cessation of the elements.🔽Some teach knowledge by means of the observation of the applications of mindfulness, the observation of the signs of the applications of mindfulness, the observation of the counteragents and the antidotes to the applications of mindfulness, and the observation of the cultivation of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang / mi bskyud pa dang / slar zhing 'byung ba dang / 'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang / mi bskyud pa dang / slar zhing 'byung ba dang / 'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
translated: Some teach knowledge by means of the observation of the arising of the applications of mindfulness that have not arisen, the observation of the abiding, non-forgetting, renewed arising, increase, and expansion of the applications of mindfulness that have arisen.

original: kha cig ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: kha cig ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
translated: Some focus on the applications of mindfulness,

original: kha cig ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul @16a *//
analyzed: kha cig ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul @16a *//
translated: some on the correct exertions,🔽the bases of supernatural power,🔽the faculties,🔽the powers,🔽the branches of enlightenment,🔽and some focus on the noble eightfold path,🔽on the signs of the noble eightfold path,

original: gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang /
translated: on the antidote to the factors that counteract the noble eightfold path,🔽on the cultivation of the noble eightfold path,🔽on the production of the noble eightfold path that has not been produced,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnyen po dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa gnas pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnyen po dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa gnas pa dang /
translated: and on the abiding, non-forgetting, and further production of the noble eightfold path that has been produced.

original: mi bskyud pa dang / slar zhing 'byung ba dang / 'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa dag mthong lags so; ;mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
analyzed: mi bskyud pa dang / slar zhing 'byung ba dang / 'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa dag mthong lags so; ;mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
translated: re-arising, and increase and expansion. Having seen that, I think:

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni chos rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ston pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni chos rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ston pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid cing /
translated: ‘These venerable ones teach knowledge by means of the realizations of various dharmas.

original: 'di ltar don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ma 'tshal bas /
analyzed: 'di ltar don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ma 'tshal bas /
translated: However, because they do not know the characteristic of the ultimate that is the same taste everywhere,

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can /
translated: these venerable ones are full of pride.

original: mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa sha stag lags so snyam bgyid lags so //
analyzed: mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa sha stag lags so snyam bgyid lags so //
translated: They teach knowledge while being full of pride.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gang gi slad du 'di skad ces don dam pa ni phra ba /🔽zab pa / rtogs @16b par dka' ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gang gi slad du 'di skad ces don dam pa ni phra ba / zab pa / rtogs @16b par dka' ba /
translated: because of the Bhagavān’s statement, ‘The ultimate is subtle,🔽profound, difficult to see,

original: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: and most difficult to understand,’

original: thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bka' stsal pa ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar lags te /
analyzed: thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bka' stsal pa ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar lags te /
translated: The Blessed One has said, ‘It has the characteristic of being of one taste everywhere.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di nyid la zhugs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di nyid la zhugs pa /
translated: Blessed One,🔽the characteristic of being of one taste everywhere in the ultimate is difficult for even those beings who have entered this teaching of the Blessed One

original: dge slong du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de ltar rtogs par dka' ba lags na /
analyzed: dge slong du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de ltar rtogs par dka' ba lags na /
translated: and become monks to realize.

original: 'di las slad rol ba'i mu stegs can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
analyzed: 'di las slad rol ba'i mu stegs can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
translated: How much more so for non-Buddhist tīrthikas!”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is so!

original: ngas ni don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid phra ba /
analyzed: ngas ni don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid phra ba /
translated: I have awakened to the subtle characteristic of being of one taste everywhere in the ultimate,

original: mchog tu phra ba /
analyzed: mchog tu phra ba /
translated: the most subtle,

original: zab pa / mchog tu zab pa /
analyzed: zab pa / mchog tu zab pa /
translated: the profound, the most profound,

original: rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: difficult to realize,

original: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: the most difficult to realize,

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: and I have fully awakened to it.

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bsnyad cing gsal bar byas /🔽rnam par phye /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bsnyad cing gsal bar byas / rnam par phye /
translated: and having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, I have explained, revealed,🔽clarified,

original: gdags par byas; rab tu bstan no //
analyzed: gdags par byas; rab tu bstan no //
translated: and taught it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni ngas don dam pa yin par yongs su bstan cing /🔽rab 'byor / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / zas rnams dang / bden pa rnams dang / khams rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang @17a *//
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni ngas don dam pa yin par yongs su bstan cing / rab 'byor / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / zas rnams dang / bden pa rnams dang / khams rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang @17a *//
translated: Why is that?🔽Subhūti, I have taught that the ultimate is the pure object of observation with regard to the aggregates.

original: dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / rab 'byor /
analyzed: dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti, I have taught that the ultimate is the pure object of observation with regard to the sense spheres, dependent origination, the sustenances, the truths, the constituents, the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object of purification of the eightfold noble path is taught to be the ultimate.

original: phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa de'ang thams cad du ro gcig pa ste /
analyzed: phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa de'ang thams cad du ro gcig pa ste /
translated: Moreover, that object of purification of the aggregates is of one taste everywhere,

original: mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: and is not of different natures.

original: phung po rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du skye mched rnams nas /
analyzed: phung po rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du skye mched rnams nas /
translated: Just as with the aggregates, so also with the sense spheres,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa de'ang thams cad du ro gcig pa ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa de'ang thams cad du ro gcig pa ste /
translated: up to the eightfold noble path: that object of purification is of one taste everywhere,

original: mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: and is not of different natures.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that by this one of many explanations, that which is of one taste everywhere, whose nature is that, is the ultimate.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa ni phung po gcig gi de bzhin nyid don dam pa'i chos bdag med pa rab tu rtogs nas yang de las gzhan pa'i phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa ni phung po gcig gi de bzhin nyid don dam pa'i chos bdag med pa rab tu rtogs nas yang de las gzhan pa'i phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, a monk who practices yoga, having realized the suchness of one aggregate, the ultimate, the selflessness of phenomena, does not then seek the suchness of the other aggregates,🔽the constituents, the sense fields,

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / zas rnams dang / bden pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang @17b pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / zas rnams dang / bden pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang @17b pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang /
translated: dependent origination, the sustenances, the truths, the establishments of mindfulness, the right efforts, the bases of supernatural power, the faculties, the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so so dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa so so la de bzhin nyid don dam pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so so dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa so so la de bzhin nyid don dam pa /
translated: the branches of awakening, and the noble eightfold path, each individually, as the ultimate,

original: bdag med pa /
analyzed: bdag med pa /
translated: selfless,

original: yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi /
analyzed: yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi /
translated: and does not seek them individually.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba gnyis med pa'i shes pa la rten pa de nyid kyis don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid nges par 'dzin pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa kho nar byed de /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba gnyis med pa'i shes pa la rten pa de nyid kyis don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid nges par 'dzin pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa kho nar byed de /
translated: The perfect reality is the non-existence of the duality of subject and object in the appearance of the duality of subject and object.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
